channel.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
channel.description:
blue dragon special Inspired by tormental('s suggestion made in ToS a few years ago)
--------------------------------- **Illusions of grandeur** (passive) you think you are another class (see below)
**Blissful Ignorance** (passive) Immune to death at night. You are not informed that you were attacked, however. In addition, if you are occupied, you will think that something prevented you from visiting your target instead (I.E. you think target had visit immunity)
--------------------- The idiot thinks he is an observer, princess, butler, or knight.
As the idiot observer, you will be told your target visited a random player, but only if they left their room. You will be told players who visited your target randomly, but the amount of names told will be the same as the amount of players visiting them.
Example: you "follow" player 1. player 1 visits player 2, and player 3 and 4 visit player 1. You may be told that player 1 visited player 8, and that he was visited by players 6 and 5.
As idiot observer, window peak will reveal a random faction of the target, unless they died that same night or you targeted the prince.
As idiot princess, flirt will reveal two random class types. If you will-o-wisp, you will be told who visited you, but no one else will. You actually do have royal blood as idiot princess. When you become king, you will think you are good, but are actually the neutral king.
As idiot butler, when attempting to serve wine, you will think you served wine to the target when you didn't. You will think you occupied them if they are not occupy immune, and you will think they declined if they are. If you try to use concentrated wine, you will think you succeeded and all visiting players will think they were occupied, but they will not be. If you try to poison king, the king will be told they were poisoned, but the king will be told they were cured either the next night or in 2 nights.
As idiot knight, you will be told you watched over your target if they are not attacked (you do visit them, but nothing else). If they are attacked, you will be told you were occupied. If you attempt to cold steel, you will be told that you were occupied.
----------------- In other words: you won't know you are an idiot, you are to stupid to recognize this (cue Normie is stupid jokes). your class card will be of whatever type of idiot you are, even if you click on it.
idiot has no conversion.
what this contributes: probably really funny; give players a moment of pause when killing observer, princess, butler, or best of all, knight.

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)

Not only it, Plex. Also its maker.

m8 people already hate me

ThePlex:

If a class is made just for fun, it gets boring pretty quickly.

I thought I said this, might be wrong.

This class would only be available on April fools day every year.

Read full topic

RopeStringFace:

what this contributes: probably really funny; give players a moment of pause when killing observer, princess, butler, or best of all, knight.

Why the crap would we want a class entirely just for laughs? We had an ability before called ‘Black Wine’ it seemed like it was just for fun and it got removed.

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
if it is neutral wild card:
its fine if it creates a little chaos
the convert/night immune vote can help evil or bd
and limited investigative abilities can also help
but, as a wild card, it can always stir up a little chaos

it was right there

item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

don’t just downright insult other player’s suggestions like this

it’s not an insult its my honest opinion
I see no reason why this class should be implemented into the game

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
JammySplodge:

it would do better if it didn’t exist

well, it doesn’t yet.

and “it would be better if it didn’t exist” I don’t just downright insult other player’s suggestions like this. I have come to that conclusion, but try and change it, not just diminish it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
JammySplodge:

key word “if”

by then you’ve probably done enough damage already

you might have. keep in mind that once there is an idiot, people will question players who claim those 4 classes. the idiot making a claim will likely just promptly others to investigate as well, and there can only be 1 idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
JammySplodge:

okay but how does it help

this class gains, and then will spread, false leads, making is a detriment to the Blue Dragon, and able to be manipulated by the evils

if he learns he is the idiot, he is confirm able by princess (only blue dragon special, sheriff can check him after princess does) and is night immune, and he remains confirmed as he can’t be converted. It was neutral survivor, but someone said it would be better as blue dragon.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class suggestion] The idiot ("fool" was taken)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Moleland:

The role is likely to die as they are going to fake claim and be an enemy to unseen. Losing if they die is too much of a penalty.

should I make him BD? He would be a BD presenting false information, but he is immune to death at night and can’t be converted.
